productDescription:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.

optionalInfo.fit:
These shorts have a slim fit. Alexander wears size 48 in and is 187cm. 

Sizes in CM:
46: hips max.* 91cm, Inseam leg16cm
48: hips max. 96cm, Inseam leg 16,5cm
50: hips max. 101cm, Inseam leg 17cm
52: hips max. 106cm, Inseam leg  17,5cm

* To make sure the waisband fits over the wides part of you hips when you put the shorts on. 

If you are inbetween sizes I suggest to choose one size up, because this fabric does not stretch.
optionalInfo.care: Wash this piece on max 40°C, don’t bleach it, let it line dry, don’t use chemicals while cleaning/washing and iron between 1-2 points.
optionalInfo.production:
This item is handmade by Lara in Zeeland and will be made after your order. 
The clothes are made- to - order to reduce overproduction and waste.
optionalInfo.additionalNotes: The jacket is handmade and will be made after your order. Therefore the delivery time will take between 3-6 days on average.
